item.title: My Organize tool use cases
item.description: Current structure graph LR; id1([Local file]) id2([Local NAS]) id3([Google Drive]) id1 -- id2; id1 -- id3; Semi automated processes Sorting my pictures

item.title: Introduction to Organize tool
item.description: Organize is a command line python utility that helps you organize your files based on rules. It is created by Thomas Feldmann and it’s available from his github repository.
